wikimedia-globalblocking-blockedtext-all: Fo saseɛ miri youri [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|pɔgʋ la a wikis nuuri zaa poɔ]].
wikimedia-globalblocking-blockedtext-on-: Yelle ayi na soŋ a fo tomboɔlo la [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|duoro ŋmɛyaaroo]].
wikimedia-globalblocking-blockedtext-mis:
Ka foŋ sage ka a da ba taa sore kɔɔ iri fo bare sɛ ka fo duoro mine bee sommo mine ayi a [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|No open proxies]] teŋdaazaa yelnyɔgraa.
Agaŋ a zaa, fo naŋ na yele yɛlɛ kyaare ne a sɛgebo [[m:Steward requests/Global|be emmo kaŋa kyɛ leɛ kaa a Meta-Wiki]].
